title: Spritzer Wear
summary: Read super fast! Now on your wrist!
description: App allows you to get experience of super fast reading on your smartwatch.If you thought smartwatches are not for reading long text... think again.App is open sourced on GitHub:https://github.com/tajchert/SpritzerWearFor fast reading it uses existing library SpritzerTextView:https://github.com/andrewgiang/SpritzerTextView
descriptionHTML:
App allows you to get experience of super fast reading on your smartwatch.
If you thought smartwatches are not for reading long text... think again.

App is open sourced on GitHub:
https://github.com/tajchert/SpritzerWear

For fast reading it uses existing library SpritzerTextView:
https://github.com/andrewgiang/SpritzerTextView
